RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 22400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 27 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since April 27 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NAMBITI was fractious in the gate, prompted the pace two wide, made the lead before a half, set a pressured pace into the stretch then drew off late while drifting out under left handed urging to win going away. SPIN DOCTOR with the second flight two wide, closed ground in the six path into the stretch, drifted in under right handed urging to the four path at the furlong marker then finished clear for second. SERVE REVENGE COLD hit the gate at the start, vied for the lead along the inside for six furlongs, shifted out to the four path for racing room, was shut off at the furlong marker then finished evenly. JUDGE HEAD set the early pace along the inside, gave up the advantage before a half, kept pressure into the stretch then faded late. RIDING IN THE WIND went evenly. SAMMY DA BULL was no factor. THE RIDER OF SERVE REVENGE COLD LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF SPINT DOCTOR FOR INTERFERENCE IN THE STRETCH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS DISQUALIFIED SPIN DOCTOR AND PLACED HIM THIRD.

ENTRY.NAME: Serve Revenge Cold
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Sadey David
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate start,vied insd,shiftd 4p,top lane,shut off 1/8p,, foul

ENTRY.NAME: Judge Head
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside lead, pressed to lane, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Nambiti
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate,pressed,set pressured pace, drew off, drifting out

ENTRY.NAME: Sammy Da Bull
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Riding in the Wind
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Spin Doctor
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, closed 6path, drifted in right urging 1/8p,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Claiming Purse 15000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISTERCHILLIWILLI broke in full stride to set all the pace and widened through the stretch to win as much the best while taken in hand late. LOCKDOWN LOVER pressured the winner along the inside into the turn, shifted outside that one then was no match while clear for second. EL BANDIDO stalked the pace and went evenly. STREET TRAFFIC failed to menace. ALTAIR failed to respond. MINDSHIP Q had speed along the inside through the turn then weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Altair
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Mindship Q
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Lockdown Lover
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, angled out turn, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Street Traffic
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Misterchilliwilli
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, drew off, much the best, handily,

ENTRY.NAME: El Bandido
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 31400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-wi nners Of A Race Since May 27 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 27 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SECRET FIX always within striking distance while saving ground through the turn, shifted out to the five path at the top of the stretch, rallied under right handed urging to make the lead past the furlong marker and drew off. WINE ME UP BABY broke in front, set the pace until mid stretch then was no match for the winner. CANDLELIGHT HOURS trailed into the stretch then closed late three wide. SQUID chased the pace three wide down the backstretch, bid determinedly two wide on the turn, battled until mid stretch then was. SALLY STRONG chased the pace two and three wide and failed to respond. LIONISTIC chased the pace near the inside for a half then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Candlelight Hours
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, late gain, 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Fix
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, altered course 5path 3/16p, drew off, right handed urging

ENTRY.NAME: Lionistic
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, stopped lane

ENTRY.NAME: Sally Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2-3wide, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Wine Me Up Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, mid stretch, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Squid
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 3 wide, loomed boldly 2 wide turn, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 94. Allowance Purse 41500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 27 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since April 27 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Consider ed In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MORESTRIDE broke alertly, set all the pace, turned back a strong bid from the runner up on the far turn and prevailed under mild right handed urging. I WANNA WIN chased the winner into the far turn, loomed boldly two wide nearing the quarter pole kept on through the stretch under left handed urging but finished second best. TO WIN stalked the pace along the inside and went evenly. OAKS HONEY was no factor. TANTRUM was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: To Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, inside, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Oaks Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Morestride
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, repulsed bid, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: I Wanna Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, loomed boldly 2 wide far turn, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Tantrum
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 21900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 27 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 27 Allowed 4lbs. Cla iming Price $16,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IT'S OFFICIAL matched strides for the lead two wide while hung out in the five path into the stretch, drifted in when struck with a right handed whip at the furlong marker bumping KID RUSSEL, the rider quickly switched to left handed urging, continued to drift in bumping the runner up a few stride later and proved best by a narrow margin under strong handling. TEAM HUCKY stalked the pace into the stretch, rallied inside the dueling leaders to gain a narrow lead at the furlong marker, was bumped soon thereafter and just missed hanging on. OAKEN raced outside and went evenly. GOLDEN MONEY failed to menace. KID RUSSELL battled for the lead in the four path inside the winner into the stretch, was bumped by that one at the furlong marker causing his rider to check then lost momentum. TEH STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND AFTER REVIEW DISQUALIFIED IT'S OFFICIAL FOR INTERFERENCE IN THE STRETECH AND PLACED HIM LAST.

ENTRY.NAME: Kid Russell
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside 4path, bumped 1/8pole, checked, dropped back,

ENTRY.NAME: dq-It's Official
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled2-3wide, drifted in, bumped rivals 1/8p, all out

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Team Hucky
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied inside, narrow lead, bumped, just failed

ENTRY.NAME: Oaken
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Quezada Maria
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside, evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 76. Allowance Purse 38400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 27 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 27 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ANCHORWOMAN broke in full stride to set all the pace and drew off through the stretch under left handed urging. HELLO SWEETS never far back, rallied three wide through the stretch and finished clear for second. SALUTE THE KID chased the winner into the stretch then faded. IN TROUBLED WATERS chased the pace into the stretch then weakened. SURE FIRE READY hopped at the start and was no factor. KERRI'S MIRACLE pressed the early pace along the inside and gave way on the turn. RUNLIKEJACKIEO was injured entering the turn, pulled up and was vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Runlikejackieo
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: injured entering turn, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Hello Sweets
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally, 3 wide, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Kerri's Miracle
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, gave way turn,

ENTRY.NAME: Sure Fire Ready
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, no factor,

ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Salute the Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Anchorwoman
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, drew off, left handed urging,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 89. Claiming Purse 16600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE DECEMBER 27 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Ohio Regis tered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STAY THIRSTY AMIGO with the second flight inside rivals, altered course to the six path entering the stretch, rallied determinedly under right handed urging to make the lead late and edged clear. HAPPILEA dueled for the lead along the inside off the rail and finished second best. LUCKY ANDY battled for the lead two wide until deep stretch then was outfinished. JACK'S ADVANTAGE trailed into the stretch, closed fast two wide then ran up on the heels of HAPPILEA nearing the wire causing his rider to check. VALHALLA AIR BASE failed to menace. DAVID'S GEM drifted out at the start, battled for the lead three wide until mid stretch then weakened late. MORE THAN GOOD was shut off at the start, settled with the second flight three wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Happilea
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, off rail, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Stay Thirsty Amigo
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight inside, altered course 6path, rallied right urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Andy
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: David's Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out start, battled 3 wide, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: More Than Good
ENTRY.OWNER: Poole Joseph M and McCall Richard H
ENTRY.COMMENT: shut off start, second flight, 3 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Jack's Advantage
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, closed fast, 2 wide, checked on heels near wire

ENTRY.NAME: Valhalla Air Base
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 72. Allowance Purse 38400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 27 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 27 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 OrLess Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STAGE NAME away alertly, prompted the pace three then two wide into the stretch, drifted out to the middle of the racetrack through deep stretch and got up in time. INTO GOLD rushed to the lead along the inside, set a pressured pace, drifted out to near mid track then couldn't handle the winner. WETZEL never far back, finished with good courage two wide. UNBRIDLED CAUSE passed tiring rivals three wide. AWESOMELY INSPIRED well placed, failed to respond. LONE BOY pressed the pace two wide through the turn then weakened. ANIMO ROBERTO was outrun. OKLAHOMA JOE hopped at the start, rushed to contention before a quarter then was used up.

ENTRY.NAME: Unbridled Cause
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals, 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Into Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead inside, drifted mid track, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Wetzel
ENTRY.OWNER: Pickerrell William D Pickerrell Joe and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well, 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Awesomely Inspired
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Lone Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Animo Roberto
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Oklahoma Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, rushed to contention, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Stage Name
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 3-2wide, drifted mid track, fully extended,
